info.name: Budlite Vouchers API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Voucher Management with React Native implementation examples.

## Base URL
`https://yourdomain.com/api/v1/tenant/{tenant}`

## Authentication
All requests require Bearer token authentication:
```
Authorization: Bearer {your_token}
```

## Voucher Types
- **JV** - Journal Voucher (General entries)
- **PV** - Payment Voucher (Cash/Bank payments)
- **RV** - Receipt Voucher (Cash/Bank receipts)
- **CV** - Contra Voucher (Bank-to-bank transfers)
- **CN** - Credit Note (Customer credits)
- **DN** - Debit Note (Customer debits)

## Key Features
- Double-entry accounting
- Automatic balance validation
- Draft/Posted status workflow
- Bulk operations
- Search and filtering

request.description:
Get all necessary data to create a voucher including voucher types, ledger accounts, and products.

**Query Parameters:**
- `type` (optional): Pre-select voucher type (jv, pv, rv, cv, cn, dn)

**Response includes:**
- Available voucher types
- Active ledger accounts with current balances
- Active products
- Selected type details (if type provided)
- Default values and validation rules

request.description:
Create a new voucher with entries.

**Request Body:**
- `voucher_type_id` (required): ID of the voucher type
- `voucher_date` (required): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- `voucher_number` (optional): Custom voucher number (auto-generated if not provided)
- `narration` (optional): Description/notes
- `reference_number` (optional): External reference
- `entries` (required): Array of at least 2 entries
  - `ledger_account_id` (required)
  - `debit_amount` (optional, default 0)
  - `credit_amount` (optional, default 0)
  - `description` (optional)
- `action` (optional): "save" (draft) or "save_and_post" (post immediately)

**Validation:**
- Total debits must equal total credits
- Each entry must have either debit OR credit (not both)
- Minimum 2 entries required
- Amounts must be positive

request.description:
List all vouchers with filters and pagination.

**Query Parameters (all optional):**
- `per_page`: Items per page (default: 20)
- `search`: Search in voucher number, narration, reference
- `voucher_type_id`: Filter by voucher type
- `status`: Filter by status (draft, posted)
- `date_from`: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_to`: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `sort_by`: Sort field (default: voucher_date)
- `sort_direction`: Sort direction (asc, desc, default: desc)

**Returns:**
- Paginated voucher list
- Statistics (totals by status)
- Pagination metadata

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific voucher including all entries and user information.

Update an existing voucher. Only draft vouchers can be updated.

**Constraints:**
- Voucher must be in "draft" status
- Same validation rules as create
- Entries must be balanced

Delete a voucher. Only draft vouchers can be deleted.

**Constraints:**
- Voucher must be in "draft" status
- All entries will be deleted automatically

response.name: Error - Posted Voucher

request.description:
Post (finalize) a voucher. Posted vouchers cannot be edited or deleted.

**What happens when posting:**
- Status changes from "draft" to "posted"
- posted_at timestamp is set
- posted_by user is recorded
- Voucher becomes read-only

**Constraints:**
- Voucher must be in "draft" status
- Entries must be balanced
- Must have at least 2 entries

request.description:
Unpost a voucher, reverting it to draft status.

**What happens when unposting:**
- Status changes from "posted" to "draft"
- posted_at timestamp is cleared
- posted_by user is cleared
- Voucher becomes editable again

**Constraints:**
- Voucher must be in "posted" status

Get data to create a duplicate of an existing voucher.

**Returns:**
- Voucher type
- Current date (for new voucher)
- Original narration
- All entries with same accounts and amounts
- Reference number is cleared

**Use this data to pre-fill create form**

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Perform bulk actions on multiple vouchers.

**Request Body:**
- `action` (required): "post", "unpost", or "delete"
- `voucher_ids` (required): Array of voucher IDs

**Actions:**
- **post**: Post multiple draft vouchers
- **unpost**: Unpost multiple posted vouchers
- **delete**: Delete multiple draft vouchers

**Response includes:**
- Success count
- Failed count
- Array of error messages for failed operations

**Query Parameters:**
- `q` (optional): Search term
- `status` (optional): Filter by status
- `voucher_type_id` (optional): Filter by type

**Returns:**
- Maximum 20 results
- Simplified voucher data with display_name
- Sorted by date (newest first)
